name: Captain Rex
description: Leader of the 501st Legion, known for his loyalty and tactical expertise.

name: 501st Legion
description: Elite clone trooper battalion commanded by Captain Rex.

name: Commander Cody
description: Trusted commander of the 212th Attack Battalion, known for his loyalty to the Republic.

name: 212th Attack Battalion
description: Famous battalion led by Commander Cody.

name: 104th Battalion (Wolfpack)
description: Famous for their shark-tooth helmets and jungle combat, led by Commander Wolffe.

name: Galactic Marines
description: Elite heavy infantry clones trained for specialized assault and boarding operations.

name: Coruscant Guard
description: Specialized unit tasked with security on Coruscant, protecting key locations and officials.

name: AT-TE
description: All Terrain Tactical Enforcer, a six-legged walker used by clone forces for heavy assault and transport.

name: TX-130 Saber-class Tank Destroyer
description: Heavily armored tank providing fire support to clone ground troops.

name: Juggernaut
description: Large, heavily armored mobile command platform and troop carrier.

name: SPHA
description: Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery providing long-range bombardment support.

name: UT-AT
description: Ultra Tank designed for heavy frontline combat and assault.

name: AT-RT
description: All Terrain Recon Transport, a fast scout vehicle.

name: ARC Troopers
description: Advanced Recon Commandos with elite training and specialized combat skills.

name: Advanced Recon Commandos (ARC Troopers)
description: Highly skilled elite clone troopers specializing in independent and covert operations.

name: Advanced Recon Force (ARF)
description: Elite clone unit trained for rapid deployment, reconnaissance, and direct action behind enemy lines.

name: Republic Commandos
description: Special operations clones trained for covert missions, sabotage, and reconnaissance.

name: Temple Guards
description: Elite clone troopers tasked with guarding the Jedi Temple and high-ranking Jedi.

name: Pilots
description: Clone troopers trained to pilot starfighters and transport ships with precision and skill.

name: Vehicle Drivers
description: Clone troopers specialized in operating a variety of ground and air vehicles in combat.

name: Snipers
description: Marksmen clones skilled in long-range engagements and reconnaissance.

name: Gunners
description: Clone troopers trained in operating heavy weapons and turrets on vehicles and ships.

name: Medics
description: Clone troopers with medical training, responsible for battlefield triage and care.

name: Heavy Weapons Specialists
description: Clones trained in the use of heavy and demolitions weaponry.

name: Jet Troopers
description: Clone troopers equipped with jetpacks for airborne assault and rapid deployment.

name: Airborne Clones
description: Specialized clone troopers trained for parachute and air insertion operations.

name: Y-wing
description: Durable starfighter used for bombing and close air support missions.

name: Outbound Flight
description: A massive, experimental Republic vessel designed to carry thousands of clones and support extended missions.

name: Venator-class Star Destroyer
description: The backbone of the Republic fleet, heavily armed and versatile.

name: Acclamator-class Assault Ship
description: Primary Republic troop transport and assault vessel, capable of delivering heavy firepower and personnel.

name: Consular-class Cruiser
description: Diplomatic cruisers often retrofitted for combat during the Clone Wars.

name: Dreadnought-class Heavy Cruiser
description: Heavily armored and armed cruiser class for frontline combat.

name: Arquitens-class Light Cruiser
description: Light cruiser with strong firepower and reconnaissance capabilities.

name: Defender-class Light Corvette
description: Fast, lightly armored corvette used for escort and patrol duties.

name: Battle of Geonosis
description: The first major battle of the Clone Wars, marking the start of large-scale conflict.

name: Battle of Umbara
description: A harsh battle fought in dark, dense forests, testing clone trooper resolve and loyalty.

name: Galactic Republic
description: The governing body of much of the galaxy during the Clone Wars, led by the Galactic Senate.
